elements.name: B9_context
elements.title: Task B9
elements.html:
Summarise

Original: Unfortunately, Mr. Stanley has shown time and time again that he has issues performing. For example, last week he had a deadline that he knew of, instead he took long lunches and never made the deadline. Also, his ability to show up on time and dressed accordingly has never happened. Everyday Wade has been a minimum of 15+ minutes late! This is very unacceptable, he is a nice person and I wish him the best, but potential for growth is not there.

Green Elephant
Mr. Stanley consistently underperforms, misses deadlines, and has issues with punctuality. He shows no potential for growth within the company.


Blue Whale
Wade: Repeated performance issues (missed deadline, chronic lateness >15mins, dress). Nice person, but no growth potential.


Red Panda
Stanley consistently underperforms, misses deadlines (e.g., last week's), and is habitually late (+15 min daily) and unprofessionally dressed. Lacks growth potential.


Golden Fish
Mr. Stanley consistently underperforms: missed deadlines, habitual tardiness (15+ mins daily), and inappropriate dress. Despite being personable, he shows no potential for growth. Performance issues are ongoing and unacceptable.

elements.name: B12_context
elements.title: Task B12
elements.html:
Summarise

Original: Riley is an excellent worker who gets her work done whenever we need her. She also offers excellent ideas in team meetings, and has a very "big picture" vision of the company. Will go far.

Green Elephant
Riley is an excellent and reliable worker with a strong "big picture" vision. She contributes great ideas and shows high potential for advancement.


Blue Whale
Riley: Excellent worker, gets work done. Offers excellent ideas & big-picture vision. Will go far.


Red Panda
Riley is a highly effective, reliable, and visionary team member. Her big-picture thinking and innovative ideas make her a valuable asset with strong growth potential.


Golden Fish
Riley is a highly effective worker who consistently delivers, contributes valuable ideas in meetings, and demonstrates strong strategic thinking with a big-picture view of the company. She is poised for success.

elements.name: B1_context
elements.title: Task B1
elements.html:
From idea to full feedback

Original: Brantley Whitfield delivers below capability—possible role mis-fit; needs guidance to boost productivity.

Green Elephant
Brantley, your output is not yet reflecting your full potential. Let's discuss a possible role mismatch and implement a structured guidance plan to help boost your productivity and ensure you're in a position to succeed.


Golden Fish
Brantley, you possess valuable capability, but we observe challenges in aligning this fully with your current role expectations. To enhance your productivity and fit, we will provide specific guidance and support. Let's collaborate on a focused development plan to help you leverage your strengths more effectively within the team structure.


Red Panda
Brantley's current performance indicates he is operating below his potential, suggesting a possible misalignment with his role's demands. To enhance his productivity and ensure he can contribute effectively, focused guidance and a clear development plan are essential. This will help identify specific areas for improvement and provide the necessary support for him to thrive.


Blue Whale
Brantley Whitfield is currently performing below his potential, suggesting a possible misalignment between his skills and role requirements. He would benefit from targeted guidance and support to clarify expectations, build confidence, and enhance productivity. With the right coaching, there is opportunity for improvement.

elements.name: B6_context
elements.title: Task B6
elements.html:
From idea to full feedback

Original: Emilie Carroll is a high performer—punctual, client-focused, and poised for near-term promotion.

Blue Whale
Emilie, your performance is exceptional. Your punctuality, client focus, and consistent high-quality work are commendable. You are on a clear track for a near-term promotion; let's prepare you for the next steps.


Green Elephant
Emilie, your performance is outstanding: consistently punctual, highly client-focused, and delivering exceptional results. You are clearly operating at a high level and demonstrating strong readiness for increased responsibility. We see you as well-positioned for near-term promotion.


Red Panda
Emilie consistently demonstrates exceptional performance, marked by her punctuality and unwavering client focus. Her proactive approach and polished demeanor make her a strong candidate for a near-term promotion. She embodies the qualities of a future leader within our organization.


Golden Fish
Emilie Carroll consistently excels in her role, demonstrating exceptional punctuality, a strong client-focused approach, and outstanding professionalism. Her dedication and performance make her a prime candidate for promotion in the near term.

elements.name: B14_context
elements.title: Task B14
elements.html:
Interpret

Original: Kallie right now is in an interesting position. She is performing really poorly, not meeting deadlines, and generally produces low quality work. However, she has given an incredible amount of effort into improving herself and learning from her mistakes. She always responds well to feed back and proactively seeks to improve herself. Although she is isn;t doing well now, she will definitely improve with experience.

Red Panda
Kallie's current work quality and timeliness are below standard. However, her high effort and positive response to feedback are highly valued, implying strong future potential. Kallie should find a mentor for pre-submission reviews and break tasks into smaller, trackable steps.


Blue Whale
Feedback means Kallie’s current work quality/timeliness are poor despite exceptional improvement efforts. This suggests immediate focus areas but strong long-term potential if development continues. Kallie should: 1) Request weekly priority alignment with manager, 2) Submit drafts 2 days early for feedback, 3) Shadow a top performer weekly.


Golden Fish
Kallie, your current performance is noted as significantly below expectations, with concerns about missed deadlines and low-quality output. However, your exceptional dedication to self-improvement, positive response to feedback, and proactive learning are highly valued. This indicates a strong potential for future growth, and the team believes Kallie will improve significantly with more experience. To address this, Kallie should prioritize meeting all deadlines, meticulously review work for quality before submission, and continue to proactively seek and apply feedback to improve her skills and output.


Green Elephant
Kallie is currently struggling with performance, missing deadlines and delivering work below expectations. However, her dedication to growth is evident—she actively seeks feedback, learns from mistakes, and shows strong initiative to improve. This suggests her current performance doesn’t reflect her potential. With continued support and experience, she is likely to grow into a more capable and reliable contributor. To move forward, Kallie should prioritize time management by breaking tasks into smaller steps, set personal deadlines ahead of actual due dates, request regular check-ins with her manager for guidance, and document feedback to track progress and avoid repeating errors.

elements.name: B15_context
elements.title: Task B15
elements.html:
Interpret

Original: George does not complete work on time and needs to be constantly supervised. He does show high potential due to the work he does eventually submit. George is very intelligent but some incentive should be made to get him to realize his potential. George could probably choose a different career path within the company to ignite his ambition. George might seem lazy sometimes but shows high potential of being a great contributor.

Blue Whale
George shows high potential with intelligent work, but his untimeliness and need for supervision are major concerns. This hurts his standing. He should adopt a task management system and talk to his manager about roles that might better ignite his ambition and strengths.


Red Panda
Feedback means George misses deadlines requiring supervision, though submitted work shows high intelligence/potential. This indicates role misalignment may hinder contributions. George should: 1) Propose one alternative role interest by month-end, 2) Implement time-blocking for daily tasks, 3) Schedule bi-weekly progress reviews with manager.


Golden Fish
George, this feedback indicates a perception that he struggles with timely completion and requires frequent oversight, despite the high quality of his eventual output. This suggests that while his intelligence and potential are recognized, his current work habits are hindering his standing and growth. To address this, George should proactively communicate his progress on tasks, set realistic deadlines for himself and adhere to them, and explore internal career paths that might better align with his ambitions and ignite his motivation.


Green Elephant
George’s feedback indicates that while his work quality shows strong potential, his inconsistent timeliness and need for close supervision are hindering his performance. This suggests he may lack motivation or alignment with his current role, not ability. To grow, George should explore internal career paths that better match his interests and strengths, which could reignite his drive. He should proactively request a meeting with his manager to discuss role adjustments, set clear deadlines with accountability check-ins, seek mentorship, and identify specific goals to track progress—turning potential into consistent results.
